name: Carol Sheehan
text: Ordered Pizza online at 10:30am for delivery at 12:30pm. When pizza hadn't arrived at 1:10pm, I called. I was told no one answered the door and that the driver called my three times. Which is weird because it was being delivered to my â€¦More

name: Jeremiah MawkingJay
text: Every time I order chicken wings or chicken tenders from this location online, they never do it right.      On the online portal you can customize your chicken with flavored sauces.  And today was the 3rd time i spent 50 bucks on chicken â€¦More

name: Wendy Wilkins Valdez
text: I wish they were in NJ, but there are so many others here, it wouldn't be easy. Great pizza, perfectly thin crust as it should be. I was happy to try them and will again in the area again.

name: Lily Mysona
text: The people are friendly and the food is consistently good. This is a great restaurant for families with young children. They have added a lot of new stuff to their menu. Something for everyone.

name: Chris Moca
text: As far as chain pizzarias go, this one is my favorite.  I love the online ordering process.  They also offer a gluten free pizza option, if you need that.

name: Peter Lombardi
text: Always great to eat there. Always friendly,also have gluten free stuff, like pizza for my granddaughter

name: T-Man For Kids! #tmoney
text: This Papa Ginoâ€™s has THE WORST Customer service I have ever dealt with. The first time I tried to eat here, our delivery took over three hours I finally had to cancel, and they told me I could get a free pizza. Next time I called no one had â€¦More

name: Adam P
text: I love this place. The spaghetti with meatballs is a great value and brings be back to when I was a little kid  great service too :)

name: Jerry
text: Friendly service. All you can eat pepperoni pizza was very good. Bathroom could use some remodeling.

name: Thomas Lang
text: Just came from this location and voided my order, this place is disgusting. The employees were coming back in from smoking and not washing their hands or wearing gloves. Not only that they were also putting pizzas directly on tables or on â€¦More

text: Worst papa ginos in the world. Wait time, horrible. Food, horrible. Service, horrible. I'd recommend you keep driving down the street to little Italy..

text: I used to order from here a couple times a week, but no more. The people that work at this location either A) Don't care about the job they are supposed to be doing, or B) Are just plain stupid..maybe both. I don't know. Having a salt â€¦More

text: Waited 45 minutes for bread sticks. Watched customers come in after calling ahead, paying and then being told the order just went in. Then the rag tag staff talked about each customer, once they left, and everyone in the dining room could â€¦More

name: Paul Klussmann
text: Absolutely the worst pizza around! We would have been physically ill if we ate what they served us. AVOID AT ALL COSTs...

name: Cindy Gaudette
text: Not a good experience this visit.  No fried food, pizza was over cooked.  Bathrooms are  nasty.  But there is plenty of parking.

name: Rosemarie Sciaraffa
text: The service was incredibly slow and disorganized.  We went on an all you can eat night with our kids. It was really hard to make them wait for pizza. The pizza was soggy and greasy.

name: Jennifer Carlson
text: I love Papa Gino's. I have always had a good experience there. When I needed an impromptu place for my daughter's birthday party they were very gracious and accomadating.

name: Matthew Lansker
text: The pizza was alright im more impressed with the service. they have a great staff very friendly and chatty

name: Mary m
text: We have ordered from here several times, the wait time is crazy and when we get there we usually wait even longer. The last time we ordered, they didn't put the toppings (that were paid for) on the pizza. I called and was told we would â€¦More

text: Has gotten so much better over the last couple months.  They have a great friendly staff now and it's so much better than it was before

name: Fitness Chadwick
text: Great people working there food is amazing!

name: Derek Clements
text: Pizza is always good in my opinion, UT every single time I order from this location I end up waiting at least an hour regardless of what I get. The staff is friendly but he whole place is very disorganized and you frequently have to remind them what your order is or you won't get it.

name: Judy Michaud
text: Rustic Pizza is made to perfection.   Staff today was friendly & great to deal with.

name: Zackery Pomerhn

name: Rick Hanson
text: Papa Ginos pizza is very tasty, but unfortunately the prices are just out of control. The prices are about $3 more per pizza about the normal average. This location has horrible service in my experience and does not appear to have the â€¦More

name: Stephen Bachand-Amirault
text: Ordered a pizza at 6:00 pm, called them at 7:30 pm to say pizza hasn't been delivered.  They said it will be here in a couple minutes.  Called back and 8:00pm to find out the driver messed up and they refunded the credit card and said pizza â€¦More

name: Cathleen Santon
text: We called in an order over the phone for a Greek salad and a gluten free pizza with no cheese (my friend is allergic). I asked for no cheese twice. We pick it up, get it home and there's cheese on it. So I called back and asked if they â€¦More

text: Love the plain cheese pizza, and the chicken wings are good. A super-bowl tradition at our house.

name: bleedinâ€™green 17
text: This location has the worst pick up service ever!!!! I ordered a pizza for pick up and they gave me the wrong one. After that the employees were talking trash to us on the phone and made us come from Salem all the way back to Beverly and made us wait a half hour to get the right pizza.

name: Kim Young
text: I brought my group (of 8) here for lunch. They all ordered seperate checks..the young man tyler was always pleasant and maintaned great customer service. He did a wonderful job multy tasking taking orders, answering phones and delivering â€¦More

name: Adri Cowan
text: If you're in Beverly, you have so many pizza options, so this is the last place you should go. Old school Papa Gino's pizza was so good - now it's comparable to Dominos. Go to Little Italy's or Prinzis!
